    • Uses of ApplicationException in dao.interfaces

      Methods in dao.interfaces that throw ApplicationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompanyDAO.createCompany(Company company)
      Creates a new row in the COMPANY table, containing all company details.
      void CouponDAO.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Creates a new row in the COUPON table, containing all coupon's data.
      void CustomerDAO.createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Creates a row in the CUSTOMER table, containing the data of customer.
      void CustomerDAO.createCustomerCoupon(long customer_id, long coupon_id)
      Creates a new row in the CUSTOMER_COUPON join table, containing customer_id and coupon_id.
      void CompanyDAO.deleteCompany(long company_id)
      Deletes a row in the COMPANY table, where company_id is found.
      void CouponDAO.deleteCoupon(long coupon_id)
      Delete's a row in the COUPON table, where COUPON.id = coupon_id.
      void CouponDAO.deleteCouponFromCustCoup(long coupon_id)
      Deletes one row in the CUSTOMER_COUPON join table where CUSTOMER_COUPON.coupon_id=coupon_id.
      void CustomerDAO.deleteCustomer(long customer_id)
      Deletes a row in the CUSTOMER table, where CUSTOMER.id=customer_id.
      void CustomerDAO.deleteCustomerCoupons(long customer_id)
      Deletes all CUSTOMER_COUPON rows where CUSTOMER_COUPON.cust_id= customer_id.
      boolean CustomerDAO.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      A method that checks the name and password received.

      A method that checks the name and password received.

      Returns a Company object by reading its details from the COMPANY table in the database, where company_id is found in the COMPANY.id column.
      Coupon CouponDAO.readCoupon(long coupon_id)
      Returns a Coupon object containing all data in the COUPON table, where COUPON.id=coupon_id.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerDAO.readCoupons(long customer_id)
      Returns a Collection of Coupon objects, containing all data from COUPON table, joined by CUSTOMER_COUPON table, where CUSTOMER_COUPON.cust_id=customer_id.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDAO.readCoupons(long company_id)
      Returns a Collection of Coupon objects containing all coupons where COUPON.company_id = company_id.

      A method to Read all coupons that their End_Date is equal to or below a certain date.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CouponDAO.readCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      Returns a Collection of Coupon objects from the COUPON table containing all coupons where COUPON.type=type.
      Customer CustomerDAO.readCustomer(long customer_id)
      Returns a Customer object containing all data from CUSTOMER table where CUSTOMER.id=customer_id.
      void CompanyDAO.updateCompany(Company company)
      Updates a a row in the COMPANY table, where company.id is found, to the details of the given company object.

      void CustomerDAO.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates a row in the CUSTOMER table, where CUSTOMER.id= customer.id, to customer's data.
